    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public static boolean sendMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver,
                                  String message,
                                  MessageSender.MessageType type)
        Sends a message.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message to be sent.
        type - The message's type.
        Returns:
        false if an error occurred while sending the message.
        If this happens:
        • either the message's type was CHAT or SYSTEM, and the sendMessage method was used as a fallback;
        • or the message's type was ACTION_BAR, and the message was not sent.

      • sendMessage

        public static boolean sendMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver,
                                  RawText message,
                                  MessageSender.MessageType type)
        Sends a message.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message to be sent.
        type - The message's type.
        Returns:
        false if an error occurred while sending the message.
        If this happens:
        • either the message's type was CHAT or SYSTEM, and the sendMessage method was used as a fallback;
        • or the message's type was ACTION_BAR, and the message was not sent.

      • sendMessage

        public static boolean sendMessage(UUID receiver,
                                  String message,
                                  MessageSender.MessageType type)
        Sends a message.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The UUId of the receiver of the message.
        message - The message to be sent.
        type - The message's type.
        Returns:
        false if no player with the given UUID is currently logged in, or if an error occurred while sending the message.
        If this happens:
        • either the message's type was CHAT or SYSTEM, and the sendMessage method was used as a fallback;
        • or the message's type was ACTION_BAR, and the message was not sent.

      • sendMessage

        public static boolean sendMessage(UUID receiver,
                                  RawText message,
                                  MessageSender.MessageType type)
        Sends a message.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The UUId of the receiver of the message.
        message - The message to be sent.
        type - The message's type.
        Returns:
        false if no player with the given UUID is currently logged in, or if an error occurred while sending the message.
        If this happens:
        • either the message's type was CHAT or SYSTEM, and the sendMessage method was used as a fallback;
        • or the message's type was ACTION_BAR, and the message was not sent.

      • sendJSONMessage

        public static boolean sendJSONMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver,
                                      String json,
                                      MessageSender.MessageType type)
        Sends a message.

        WARNING: don't use this method to send action bars, as they does NOT support JSON (the JSON code would be displayed in the action bar).

        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        json - The JSON message to be sent.
        type - The message's type.
        Returns:
        false if an error occurred while sending the message.
        If this happens:
        • either the message's type was CHAT or SYSTEM, and the sendMessage method was used as a fallback;
        • or the message's type was ACTION_BAR, and the message was not sent.

      • sendJSONMessage

        public static boolean sendJSONMessage(UUID receiver,
                                      String json,
                                      MessageSender.MessageType type)
        Sends a message.

        WARNING: don't use this method to send action bars, as they does NOT support JSON (the JSON code would be displayed in the action bar).

        Parameters:
        receiver - The UUId of the receiver of the message.
        json - The message to be sent.
        type - The message's type.
        Returns:
        false if no player with the given UUID is currently logged in, or if an error occurred while sending the message.
        If this happens:
        • either the message's type was CHAT or SYSTEM, and the sendMessage method was used as a fallback;
        • or the message's type was ACTION_BAR, and the message was not sent.

      • sendChatMessage

        public static boolean sendChatMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver,
                                      String message)
        Sends a chat message, like a message in the main channel or a private message.

        A message of this kind will be hidden if the « Show chat » option is set to « commands only ».

        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the sendMessage method is automatically called as a fallback.

      • sendChatMessage

        public static boolean sendChatMessage(UUID receiver,
                                      String message)
        Sends a chat message, like a message in the main channel or a private message.

        A message of this kind will be hidden if the « Show chat » option is set to « commands only ».

        Parameters:
        receiver - The UUID of the receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if no player with the given UUID is currently logged in, or if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the sendMessage method is automatically called as a fallback.

      • sendChatMessage

        public static boolean sendChatMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver,
                                      RawText message)
        Sends a chat message, like a message in the main channel or a private message.

        A message of this kind will be hidden if the « Show chat » option is set to « commands only ».

        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the sendMessage method is automatically called as a fallback.

      • sendChatMessage

        public static boolean sendChatMessage(UUID receiver,
                                      RawText message)
        Sends a chat message, like a message in the main channel or a private message.

        A message of this kind will be hidden if the « Show chat » option is set to « commands only ».

        Parameters:
        receiver - The UUID of the receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if no player with the given UUID is currently logged in, or if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the sendMessage method is automatically called as a fallback.

      • sendSystemMessage

        public static boolean sendSystemMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver,
                                        String message)
        Sends a system message, like the result of a command.

        It is technically equivalent to call receiver.sendMessage(message), but this method uses packets directly.

        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the sendMessage method is automatically called as a fallback.

      • sendSystemMessage

        public static boolean sendSystemMessage(UUID receiver,
                                        String message)
        Sends a system message, like the result of a command.

        It is technically equivalent to call Bukkit.getPlayer(receiver).sendMessage(message), but this method uses packets directly and don't fail with an NPE (returns false) if the player is not logged in.

        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if no player with the given UUID is currently logged in, or if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the sendMessage method is automatically called as a fallback.

      • sendSystemMessage

        public static boolean sendSystemMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver,
                                        RawText message)
        Sends a system message, like the result of a command.

        It is technically equivalent to call receiver.sendMessage(message), but this method uses packets directly.

        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the sendMessage method is automatically called as a fallback.

      • sendSystemMessage

        public static boolean sendSystemMessage(UUID receiver,
                                        RawText message)
        Sends a system message, like the result of a command.

        It is technically equivalent to call Bukkit.getPlayer(receiver).sendMessage(message), but this method uses packets directly and don't fail with an NPE (returns false) if the player is not logged in.

        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if no player with the given UUID is currently logged in, or if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the sendMessage method is automatically called as a fallback.

      • sendActionBarMessage

        public static boolean sendActionBarMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player receiver,
                                           String message)
        Sends a temporary message displayed above the hotbar during approximately three seconds.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the message is not sent at all. Such an error is likely to be caused by an incompatible Bukkit version.
        See Also:
        ActionBar

      • sendActionBarMessage

        public static boolean sendActionBarMessage(UUID receiver,
                                           String message)
        Sends a temporary message displayed above the hotbar during approximately three seconds.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of the message.
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        false if no player with the given UUID is currently logged in, or if an error occurred while sending the message. If this happens, the message is not sent at all. Such an error is likely to be caused by an incompatible Bukkit version.
        See Also:
        ActionBar
